display_banner.banner:
**** Authorized users and purposes only - Violators will be prosecuted ****

Access to this and use of system are restricted to authorized users and
designated purposes. Unauthorized acccess or access attempts to this system,
as well as use of this system for prohibited purposes are a crime. Criminal
trespass to this system will be prosecuted.

To maintain proper system operation and detect/deter unauthorized use, system
administrators may monitor this system. All user activities may be observed,
recorded, and/or subject to automated logging.

 * Acceptance and Agreement *
Continuing past this point constitutes attestation of your authorization to
access this system, agreement that your use of this system falls within the
scope of allowed purposes, and your acceptance of and consent to monitoring,
logging, and recording of your activities.

 * Disagreement *
If you do not agree to all of the above, you must immediately disconnect from
this system.
